Accepted Workshops

    [W1]   Workshop on Multimodal Machine Learning in Low-resource Languages
    Organizers:    Bharathi Raja Chakravarthi - National University of Ireland Galway, Ireland, Abirami Murugappan - Anna University, India, Dhivya Chinnappa - Thomson Reuters, USA, Adeep Hande - Indiana University Bloomington, IN, USA, Shardul Suryawanshi - National University of Ireland Galway, Ireland.
    [W2]    Workshop on AI and Law
    Organizer:    Ashutosh Modi, Abhinav Joshi - IIT Kanpur, India.
    [W3]    Natural Language Processing in Agriculture and Livestock Management
    Organizers:    Manjira Sinha - IIT Kharagpur, India, Tirthankar Dasgupta - TCS Research, India, Sanjay Chatterjee - IIIT Kalyani, India.
    [W4]    Workshop on Context-aware NLP in eHealth
    Organizers:    Mohammed Hasanuzzaman - ADAPT Centre, Ireland, Gaël Dias - University of Caen Normandie, France, Jyoti Prakash Singh - NIT Patna, India.
    [W5]    Workshop on Indian Code-mixed and Low-resource Natural Language Processing (ICLrNLP)
    Organizer:    Md Shad Akhtar - IIIT Delhi, India.

Accepted Tutorials

    [T1]  Legal Text Analytics
    Organizer:    Vasudha Bhatnagar, Vikas Kumar - Dept of Computer Science, Faculty of Mathematical Sciences, University of Delhi , Balaji Ganesan - IBM Research, India, Muhammad Abulaish - South Asian University, Parikshet Sirohi, Ashwini Siwal - Law Center - II, Faculty of Law, University of Delhi.
    [T2]    Knowledge Graph driven Business Text Processing
    Organizer:    Lipika Dey, Tirthankar Dasgupta - TCS Research.
    [T3]   Dialog Systems: Trends and Challenges
    Organizer:    Siddhartha Mukherjee, Aniruddha Tammewar, Raghavendra H R, Sandeep Pandey, Abhijit Nargund, Rituraj Singh, Vivek Sridhar - Samsung Research - India .
    [T4]    Advances in NLP Research for Automated Business Intelligence
    Organizer:    Vinayak Gupta, Rajmohan C, Ritwik Chaudhuri, Ankush Gupta, Balaji Ganesan, Arvind Agarwal, Sameep Mehta - IBM Research, India
    [T5]    Towards Process Knowledge-infused Learning for Explainable Mental Healthcare
    Organizer:    Kaushik Roy - University of South Carolina, Manas Gaur - University of Maryland Baltimore County, Amit Sheth - University of South Carolina.
    [T6]    Discourse Structure Analysis of Indian Languages (DSAIL 2022)
    Organizer:    Soma Paul - IIIT Hyderabad, Debopam Das - Humboldt University of Berlin, Germany.
    [T7]   Social Bias Detection and Mitigation in Text
    Organizer:    Nihar Sahoo, Sandhya Singh, Prapti Roy, Niteesh Mallela, Himanshu Gupta, Pushpak Bhattacharyya - CFILT, Indian Institute of Technology Bombay,
    [T8]   Text-guided Image Generation and Manipulation
    Organizer:    Abhishek Sharma and Achyut Saxena - Bobble AI,

Shared Task

    [S1]    Word Level Language Identification in Code-mixed Kannada-English Texts
    Organizer:    Fazlourrahman Balouchzahi, Sabur Butt - Instituto Politécnico Nacional (IPN), Mexico., Noman Ashraf - Harvard Medical School, USA, Asha Hegde, Shashirekha Hosahalli Lakshmaiah - Mangalore University, India., Grigori Sidorov, Alexander Gelbukh - Instituto Politécnico Nacional (IPN), Mexico..
